statements: SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY diagnosis ASC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL AND diagnosis LIKE '%infection%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, location FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM ResearchData ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, research_data FROM Patients JOIN ResearchData ON Patients.patient_id = ResearchData.patient_id WHERE Patients.age < 40;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, location FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT research_date, research_data FROM ResearchData WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE age < 25) ORDER BY research_date;
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' AND location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, location FROM Patients JOIN ResearchData ON Patients.patient_id = ResearchData.patient_id WHERE ResearchData.research_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE efficacy = 'High' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND diagnosis LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study FROM Researchers;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON diagnosis = efficacy;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost >= 50 ORDER BY cost
SELECT treatment_name, cost, duration FROM Treatments
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' AND age BETWEEN 40 AND 50
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100 AND duration < 10 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT * FROM Studies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Researchers WHERE institution='University XYZ';
SELECT id, observation_date, observation_text FROM Observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, gender, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' OR gender='Female';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT p.full_name AS patient_name, t.treatment_date, t.treatment_description FROM Treatments t JOIN Patients p ON t.patient_id = p.id WHERE t.treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT r.full_name AS researcher_name, rp.project_name, min(rp.start_date) AS earliest_start_date FROM Researchers r JOIN ResearchProjects rp ON r.id = rp.researcher_id GROUP BY r.full_name, rp.project_name ORDER BY earliest_start_date ASC;

SELECT o.observation_date, p.full_name AS patient_name, r.full_name AS researcher_name, o.observation_text FROM Observations o JOIN Patients p ON o.patient_id = p.id JOIN Researchers r ON o.researcher_id = r.id WHERE o.observation_date > '2022-01-01';
